TopicTitle: Updating VEEEEEEERY OLD Single Part and IVA

Articles.Content: Hi Guys, i have found the beautiful FLY pod from Bobcat from version 21.1 in an old folder, and i want to bring it in the 1.5 version of KSP. Does anyone know how to do? It Has even an IVA and i want it to work. Thank you in advance for any help. Even if you have some suggestion on tutorials it will be ok.
